short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The JIRA Planner is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of uploading test cases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Bulk Test Case Upload: With this extension, you can effortlessly upload multiple test cases to your JIRA project in one go, significantly reducing the time and effort required for manual entry. Whether you have a few test cases or hundreds, this tool can handle them all.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface that seamlessly integrates with your JIRA environment. You don't need to be a technical expert to use it effectively.

Import from Excel/CSV: If your test cases are already organized in Excel or CSV files, you can import them directly into the extension. This feature allows for a smooth transition from existing workflows to an automated bulk upload process.

Error Handling: The extension includes robust error handling capabilities to ensure that your data is uploaded accurately. If any issues are detected, you'll receive clear error messages with suggestions for resolution.

Progress Tracking: Stay informed about the progress of your test case uploads. The extension provides real-time status updates, so you always know how many test cases have been successfully uploaded and if any are pending.

Secure Authentication: Your JIRA credentials are securely stored and encrypted, ensuring the privacy and security of your data. The extension uses industry-standard security practices to protect sensitive information.
